award-group.award-id: This funder provided support in the form of salary for MAH, but did not have any additional role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript. The specific roles of these authors are articulated in the ‘author contributions’ section. This author affiliation does not alter our adherence to PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials. MAH affirms that there are no competing interests associated with this funder.

AJP affirms that there are no competing interests associated with this funder.
